WNYC, Municipal Broadcasting System

New York 7, N. Y.
July 28th. 1952
Mr. Herschcl J. Wartik
Assistant Art Director
University of Illinois Press
Urbana. Illinois
Dear Mr. Wartik?
I am returning, herewith, the proofs and the paste-up for
"The Jeffersonian" folders. I am also including copy for
the overprint, together with the number ordered for each.
The exact information for Station WBAA can be had direct
from Jim Miles.
The balance of the 350,000 folders will be left blank.
In addition to the 75,000 for WNYC, I hope you will send
an additional 20,000 blank folders to me, here in New York,
for inclusion in letters which are going out all over the
country.
I rely upon your own judgment in setting up the overprints.
With best wishes, I am
Sincerely yours.
Seymour N. Siegel
President
